newsitem.title: USA: NY precious metals called to open mostly firmer.
newsitem.headline: NY precious metals called to open mostly firmer.

text.p: COMEX and NYMEX precious metals futures were called to open mostly higher Thursday in line with a slightly firmer bullion market overnight.
Trade is expected to be quiet, with May Day holidays in much of continental Europe and Japan's Golden Week holidays starting today too.

Resurfaced concerns about central bank gold sales and renewed shorting by funds have driven gold prices down to test four year lows in the past week, but support has been found again around $340 an ounce, analysts said.
